data.name: Sentient Noir: the Dark and Dank
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


What to expect

This series takes place before the up-coming game of the same name. This series expands the story of the game and the hard-boiled city of Night Light City. You will experience Film Noir, scifi, cyberpunk and ganster fusion in this vast, diverse world.


#label_about_the_series



Welcome to Night Light City - a dark, dank and alluring vixen, a seductive silhouette, comprised of four hard-boiled districts. Once you enter her blood-soaked streets and embrace her mysterious alleys, you'd never escape her midnight grasp. Because of her cynical conditioning over the centuries, she leaves the four districts with many ambitions to be desired: to change the oppressive city into their own vision and to control her. However, with the Night Light City organisation at large, and keeping things running as she wants, the districts struggle to act out their ideologies. But, despite their differences, they all have one thing in common: to seize the power of a deadly Detective Hunter, capable of controlling all of 'Sentimant Kind'.
data.about_the_game: Welcome to Night Light City - a dark, dank and alluring vixen, a seductive silhouette, comprised of four hard-boiled districts. Once you enter her blood-soaked streets and embrace her mysterious alleys, you'd never escape her midnight grasp. Because of her cynical conditioning over the centuries, she leaves the four districts with many ambitions to be desired: to change the oppressive city into their own vision and to control her. However, with the Night Light City organisation at large, and keeping things running as she wants, the districts struggle to act out their ideologies. But, despite their differences, they all have one thing in common: to seize the power of a deadly Detective Hunter, capable of controlling all of 'Sentimant Kind'.
data.short_description: Welcome to Night Light City - a dark, dank and alluring vixen, a seductive silhouette, comprised of four hard-boiled districts. These Four factions hunt a power capable of controlling the city and that of the ‘Sentimant kind’. A power that resides in the soul of a deadly ‘Detective Hunter’.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: Intel Core 2 или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 5 Мбит/с для 540p, 3 Мбит/с для 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 10
  • Процессор: Для воспроизведения HD 1080p рекомендуется процессор Intel Core i3+ или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 12 Мбит/с для 1080p или 8 Мбит/с для 720p.
